edit_script:
<actions>
  <update-node tree="comparison_operator: > [2060,2061]" label=">=" />
  <update-node tree="member_expression: amount <= IERC20(address(_synthsUSD())).allowance [1158,1207]" label="amount  < IERC20(address(_synthsUSD())).allowance" />
  <update-node tree="member_expression: payment <= loan.amount.add [3641,3667]" label="payment  < loan.amount.add" />
</actions>
